title: Specific tricks you have?
body: For instance I run 4 mana regeneration runes on Ziggs. Any weird trick you do like masteries or runes that you dont see many other ppl do?

replies.body:
Walk towards an unwarded brush.
Suddenly move to the side a little before you enter the bush.
Dodge an incoming cc.

"H0LY SH1T $C1PTS!!"

I do this pretty much for every bush.

Considering how many people use an ability immediately when it is off CD, I just keep an internal count and move to the side the moment it is available.

This is especially useful for avoiding abilities such as Olaf's Undertow or Mundo's Infected Cleaver.

With Syndra, Q them once then E to stun. Make sure the Q hits them the first time so they take both the damage from the Q and the sphere heading toward them with E.

With Karthus don't build boots and go full AP to insta kill the enemy adc when they're at 70% health or lower.


i barely use runes so :c

bruh we know the syndra Q and E trick. its really basic on that champion lulz

Play Lulu support.

Run mana regen runes and Windspeaker's.

Build Athene's.

Does not max E first.

Say that Dragon Trainer and Winter Lulu are only mediocre skins.

Sorry the list just goes on.
Neat, thought I was the only one using mana regen runes on Ziggs.
Yeah it helps a TON early game lets him clear two extra waves before backing near 6 depending on how game is.
when playing Udyr i don't put a point in Phoenix Stance until 16 if I'm laning, always keep Turtle on when you are CSing, and no one can outrun a BOTRK/Bear/Ghostblade/Frozen Mallet Udyr

My Blitz runes are kinda bizarre I guess:

9x AD red
9X Armor yellow
3x scaling MR blue
3x flat mana blue
3x flat mana blue
1 armor quint, 1 AD quint and 1 flat mana quint
________

Overall stats:

+11 AD
+71 mana
+0,99 mana regen/ 5
+13 Armor
+9 MR@18

You don't use 1/3 of your mana for a grab, you use your AS steroid on W and your E hits harder.
